title: The Four-Gated City
description: The 1993 edition of this ISBN can be found hereDorris Lessing's classic series of autobiographical novels is the fictional counterpart to Under My Skin. In these five novels, first published in the 1950's and 60s, Doris Lessing transformed her fascinating life into fiction, creating her most complex and compelling character, Martha Quest.
author: Doris Lessing
